overview:
## Overview

By default the type name of the `Tip` conforming struct will be used as the tip’s `id`. Specifying a custom `id` allows you to create reusable tips based on their content.

items.description: A title that names the tip.
items.name: title

items.description: A short description of how to use the tip’s feature.
items.name: message

items.description: The image associated with the tip.
items.name: image

title: id
